author: craigmcc
msg: Update build process to depend on the jdbc2_0-stdext.jar file (if
available), rather than requiring j2ee.jar from the J2EE RI just to define
the javax.sql classes.  (If you do have j2ee.jar available, you can still
go ahead and point the "jdbc20ext.jar" property at it.)

author: craigmcc
msg: Update to new distribution directory guidelines.
